content:
Hi! I am a rising senior at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Roorkee, majoring in Electronics and Communications Engineering. I am currently interested in Deep Learning, with particular applications in Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision.
I am currently working as a MITACS Globalink Research Intern at Prof. Fatemeh H. Fard’s lab at UBC. I am also working as a Summer Intern at Prof. Jonghyun Choi’s lab at GIST.
At IIT Roorkee, I am a core member of a Deep Learning research centric reading group named the Vision and Language Group, and the IEEE Student Chapter, IIT Roorkee. I have also served as the Chief News Coordinator of the official student media body of the university - Watch Out!.
I worked as a Research and Development Intern at Pando Labs - PandoCorp PLC during the fall of 2020. In the past, I have been fortunate to work with Prof. Saurabh Khanna, Prof. Raksha Sharma and Prof. Balasubramanian Raman at IIT Roorkee.
In my free time, I love reading about economics and human psychology. My other interests include playing football, squash and the guitar.
summary: Hi! I am a rising senior at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Roorkee, majoring in Electronics and Communications Engineering. I am currently interested in Deep Learning, with particular applications in Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision.
title: Divyam Goel

summary: PyTorch reproduction of the paper titled 'Hyperspectral Unmixing Using a Neural Network Autoencoder' (Palsson et al. 2018). [`CODE`](https://github.com/dv-fenix/HyperspecAE)
title: HyperspecAE

summary: Implemented some Policy Gradient RL algorithms (using PyTorch) on the CartPole environment by OpenAI. [`CODE`](https://github.com/dv-fenix/ReinforcementLearning)
title: Policy Gradient Methods

summary: Trying to utilize a large pre-trained language model to build a English-Hindi machine translation system. [`CODE`](https://github.com/dv-fenix/ITR)
title: Indic-Language Translation

summary: Fine-Tuning a BERT model for Sentiment Classification on the SMILE: Twitter Emotion Dataset. [`CODE`](https://github.com/dv-fenix/SentimentClassification)
title: Sentiment Analysis with BERT

summary: Developed a Web Application using Flask and StreamLit for the visualization of the weights on neural network. [`CODE`](https://github.com/dv-fenix/NNVisualizer)
title: NNVisualizer

summary: Designed an autonomous vehicle using a combination of image processing and IoT methods. [`CODE`](https://github.com/dv-fenix/sdc) [`DEMO`](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1a9_sL_4uRCQaQuHgoHzgnGEBgMN6eqTH?usp=sharing)
title: Self Driving Car
